Social media has become a competitive space where only the brands that communicate with purpose, consistency, and clarity manage to stand out. At Lira, we treat social media as a business growth tool, not just a place to publish posts. Every piece of content must serve a purpose. Social.listItem2: Content Designed for Performance - From high-impact banners and carousels to short-form videos and copywriting that converts. We build content that captures attention and drives action.

Brand.description: Your brand isn’t just a logo. It’s the impression you leave once you’re no longer in the room.

Brand.listItem3: Scalable Visual Systems - We design logos, color palettes, typography, and modular graphic elements — all optimized for flexibility and performance across any channel or platform.
Brand.listItem4: Differentiation & Repositioning Strategies - We help define what makes you unique, why that matters to your audience, and how to build a brand image that’s not just appealing — but unforgettable.

Google.description: Your audience is already searching. We make sure they find you.
Google.subtitle: Promotion that brings real results, not just views
Google.intro: Google Ads and YouTube Ads are essential when you want immediate visibility, measurable performance, and targeting based on real buying intent. At Lira, we don't just launch ads. We build integrated advertising systems where every click makes sense and every conversion is tracked and optimized.
Google.listTitle: What types of campaigns we use and when they’re most effective
Google.listItem1: Search Ads – Text-based ads that show on Google search results, based on keyword intent. Recommended for lead generation, bookings, quote requests, ecommerce.
Google.listItem2: Display Ads – Visual ads (banners) that appear across websites in Google’s Display Network. Great for remarketing, awareness, and large-scale visual promotion. Less effective for direct conversions unless paired with search.
Google.listItem3: YouTube Ads – Video ads shown before, during, or after videos on YouTube. Ideal for product launches, storytelling, and brand positioning. Works well for awareness and remarketing.
Google.listItem4: Performance Max – AI-powered campaigns that run across all Google networks (Search, Display, YouTube, Gmail, Maps, Discover). Best used for ecommerce or clear lead generation goals with optimized landing pages. Not recommended without a fully tracked site setup (GA4, events, goals).
Google.listItem5: Shopping Ads – Product ads with images, prices, and merchant name shown in search results. Suitable for online stores with product feeds integrated through Merchant Center. Not applicable to service-based or non-ecommerce businesses.
Google.listItem6: App Campaigns – Ads to promote mobile apps across all Google platforms. Works for mobile apps with existing users and strong reviews. Not recommended if the app lacks traction or user feedback.
Google.listItem7: Local Ads – Ads that drive traffic to a physical location like a clinic, store, or restaurant. Effective with a verified and optimized Google Business profile. Not suitable for businesses that operate exclusively online.
Google.listItem8: Discovery Ads – Native ads shown on YouTube, Google Discover, and Gmail. Useful for brand visibility and discovery. Lower conversion rates compared to search-based campaigns.
Google.secondListItem1: We work with real data, not assumptions: keyword research, A/B testing, GA4, and audience segmentation.
Google.secondListItem2: We align advertising with your funnel so that each step leads toward action.
Google.secondListItem3: We optimize for outcomes like ROAS, CPA, cost per lead, and assisted conversions.
Google.secondListItem4: We constantly improve performance by adjusting visuals, messaging, budgets, and targeting.
Google.thirdListItem1: A tailored Google Ads strategy aligned with your business goals
Google.thirdListItem2: Clear reporting with practical insights, no vague metrics
Google.thirdListItem3: Full integration with your website, CRM, and internal systems
Google.thirdListItem4: Traffic that converts, not just empty reach

BusinessConsulting.description: Strong structure. Lasting relationships. Healthy sales growth.
BusinessConsulting.intro:
When you’re running a business, it’s easy to get caught in the day-to-day whirlwind. Urgent
tasks pile up, repetitive work takes over, and key opportunities slip away. We’ve worked with clients in France, Dubai, Romania, and Moldova, and we’ve seen the same pattern. A business with real potential can stall simply because it lacks the right structure. Our consulting is not about theory or pretty slides. It’s hands-on. We work closely with you and your team to bring clarity, organization, and systems that support real, scalable growth.
BusinessConsulting.listItem1: Assess your current foundation - We map what works, what wastes time and resources, and what’s holding you back from scaling. This includes a deep look at your team, workflows, internal communication, and client management.
BusinessConsulting.listItem2: Clarify roles and organize the team - Who’s responsible for what? What can be automated or delegated? What gaps exist? We help you build a structure that is simple, clear, and repeatable.
BusinessConsulting.listItem3:
Build or optimize your sales system - From first contact to loyal customer, we support you in developing:
• A consistent flow of qualified leads
ִ• A structured follow-up process
• Efficient offer creation and closing steps
• Client retention tools and workflows
BusinessConsulting.listItem4: Make the system usable by your entire team - It should not all depend on you. We create internal procedures, onboarding plans, and scalable processes that allow the business to function and grow without being dependent on key individuals.
BusinessConsulting.listItem5: Focus on building long-term relationships, not just quick sales - We help you shift from transactional selling to strategic partnerships with your clients. The goal is to create trust, continuity, and sustainable revenue.
BusinessConsulting.closingText1: What you walk away with? A business that is organized. A team that knows what to do and why. And clients who recognize your professionalism from the very first interaction.
BusinessConsulting.closingText2:
It’s not how loud or how fast you grow that matters. It’s how well your business is
built.
